title: Scenario: Food Ordering Enabled
custom_preconds: Given that Food Ordering has been enabled in the portal (https://bamutil.qa.mlb.com/food-order/) for a ballpark
custom_steps: When the app is accessed in At the Ballpark
custom_expected: Then the user will be able to enter valid seat info successfully

title: ***Scenario: Food Ordering Disabled
custom_preconds: Given that Food Ordering has been disabled in the portal (https://bamutil.qa.mlb.com/food-order/) for a ballpark

title: Scenario: Clicking on 'back' will return the user to the At The Ballpark app
custom_preconds: Given The user has accessed food ordering
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the back button at the top left corner of the screen
custom_expected: Then The user will be returned to the At the Ballpark app at the same page of which they originally entered Food Ordering from.

title: Scenario: Coming soon page
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering for a ballpark that has not opened up food ordering to the public yet for the first time in production
and they are a team that is scheduled to.
custom_steps: When the food ordering screen loads
custom_expected:
Then The user will not see the standard home screen
but they will see a Coming Soon page stating 'Mobile Food & Beverage Ordering Coming Soon'

title: Scenario: No Coming soon page
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering in production
and the ballpark has already opened food ordering to the public at some time
custom_steps: When When the page loads
custom_expected:
The user will be on the home screen
and they will see four buttons: place order
and my orders
and FAQ
and Sign In/Out
and they will not see a 'Mobile Food & Beverage Ordering Coming Soon' page

title: Scenario: Place Order Button is enabled
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and Food Ordering is Enabled at the Stadium Level via the Portal.
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the Place Order Button
custom_expected: Then The user will be brought to the Enter Seat Screen Info

title: Scenario: Place Order Button Disabled
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and food ordering is disabled at the stadium level (via campaign manager)
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the Place Order Button
custom_expected:
Then The user will receive the message 
Food Ordering Disabled
Food Ordering is Currently disabled. Please try again later.

title: Scenario: My Orders Button
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and falls into one of the following scenarios:
a) never placed an order on this device before
b) has placed an order on this device before within the past 720 hours
c) has placed an order on this device
and an order over 720 hours ago
d) has placed an order on this device within the past 720 hours
and has placed an order on this device over 720 hours ago
custom_steps: When My Orders is Clicked on
custom_expected:
Then
a) My orders should open
and the text that should display is 'You have no orders' should display
b) My Orders should open
and should be a list of all orders placed within the past 720 hours
c) The My orders screen should open 
and the text that should display is'You have no orders' should display
d) My Orders should open
and list only the orders that were placed within the past 720 hours
and not list any orders that were placed over 720 hours ago

title: Scenario: FAQ Button
custom_preconds: Given The user has accessed food ordering
custom_steps: When The user clicks the FAQ button
custom_expected: Then the FAQ page will open.

title: Scenario: Sign In Button Functionality
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering 
and the user is not logged in
and the user has a valid bamnet account
custom_steps: When The Sign In button is clicked
custom_expected:
Then The user is brought to a screen where they can enter their email address
and password
and there is a submit button present

title: Scenario Sign Out Button Functionality
custom_preconds:
Given The user has signed in
and the user is on the home screen
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the sign out button
custom_expected: Then The button will now say Sign In

title: Scenario: Signing in
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and the user is not signed in
and the user clicks on the Sign In button
and the user has a valid bamnet account
custom_steps:
When the user enters their bamnet email address
and password
and clicks submit
custom_expected:
Then The user will be brought to the home screen
and the the button that once read 'Sign in' will now read 'Sign Out  <email address>'
and the email address will be the email address that the user used to sign in

title: Scenario: Back Button
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and has clicked on the Order Food Button
and the user is on the Enter Seat Screen
custom_steps: When The user clicks the back button
custom_expected: Then The user will be brought back to the home screen

title: Scenario: Input fields on Enter Seat Info Screen
custom_preconds: Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
custom_steps: When The Order Food Button is clicked
custom_expected:
Then the Enter Seat page will display
and the three input fields are Section
and Row
and Seat
AND Submit button

title: Entering seat information with no seat information stored for any ballpark
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
and the user has clicked on Order Food
and the user has not entered seat information for any ballpark prior to this
custom_steps: When the page loads
custom_expected: Then The user will see all three input fields blank

title: Entering seat information with no seat stored for that ballpark but seat stored for another ballpark
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
and has clicked on the Order Food Button
and they have previously entered seat information for another ballpark
and they have not previously entered seat information for this ballpark
custom_steps: When The screen loads
custom_expected: Then The user should see all three input fields blank.

title: Entering seat information with seat information already stored for that ballpark and no other ballparks
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
and has clicked on Order Food 
and the user has previously entered seat information once and only once prior for this ballpark
and that information has been stored
and the user remembers the seat information that was entered the previous time
and the user has not previously entered seat information for another ballpark
custom_steps: When The the screen loads
custom_expected: Then The user will see the seat information that was entered in the prior time.

title: Entering seat information with multiple seats previously entered for this ballpark
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and has clicked on Order Food
and the user has previously entered in their seat information at this ballpark on multiple instances
and that seat information has been unique at least two prior times
and the user remembers what the most recent seat entered was
custom_steps: When the screen loads
custom_expected: Then The three input fields should be populated with the most recent seat information that the user has entered for this ballpark.

title: Entering seat information with seat information for that ballpark and at least one other ballpark
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and has clicked on Order Food
and the user has previously entered seat information for this ballpark
and the user remembers that seat information
and the user has previously entered seat information for another ballpark
and for the other ballpark - the seat information was different
and the user remembers that seat information
custom_steps: When The screen loads
custom_expected: Then the seat information that was previously entered the previous time for that ballpark will populate in the three input fields

title: Scenario: Invalid Section
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and the user has clicked on place order
custom_steps:
When The user enters in a section that is not mapped to a stand
and the user enters a row
and seat
and clicks submit
custom_expected:
Then The user will receive the error
Invalid Section
Ballpark Express is not currently offered in your section. Try back soon.
And if the above steps are performed at Citi Field, the user will be prompted by "Only available for Delta seating area"

title: Scenario: Leaving the Section input field blank
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and clicked on the place order button
custom_steps:
When the user leaves the section field blank
and 
a) leaves the remaining two fields blank and clicks submit
b) leaves the row field blank and fills in the seat field and clicks submit
c) fills in the row field and leaves the seat field blank and clicks submit
custom_expected:
The user will get the message:
Invalid Seat Info
Please check your section, seat and row

title: Scenario: Leaving the row field blank
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and has clicked on Place Order
custom_steps:
When The user

a)Enters a valid section
and seat
and leaves the row field blank
and clicks submit

b) Leaves the section field blank
and row field blank
and enters a seat 
and clicks submit
custom_expected:
The user will get the message:
Invalid Seat Info
Please check your section, seat and row

title: Scenario: Leaving the Seat Field Blank
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and the user has clicked on Place Order
custom_steps:
When The user enters a valid section
and enters a row
and leaves the Seat field blank
and clicks submit
custom_expected:
The user will get the message:
Invalid Seat Info
Please check your section, seat and row

title: Scenario: Accessing the menu screen after entering valid seat information
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
and the user has entered a valid section that corresponds to only one stand
and a valid row
and a valid seat
custom_steps: When The user clicks submit
custom_expected: Then The user is brought to the 'Menu' screen

title: Scenario: Submitting information after error
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and the user has clicked on Order Food
and the user has entered invalid information on the seat info screen (ie. leaving a section blank)
and the user has clicked submit
and the user has received the Invalid Seat Info message
custom_steps:
When The user corrects the incorrect information
and clicks submit
custom_expected: Then The user will be brought to the next screen which will either be the Locations Screen or the Menu depending on the configuration in the portal.

title: Scenario: Accessing the menu when ordering food is disabled for one stand per section
custom_preconds:
Given A stand has been set to be disabled for food ordering through the portal
and the user has accessed Food Ordering
and the user has clicked on Place Order
and the user enters a section number that corresponds to the stand that has been disabled
and this section only corresponds to this one stand
and the user enters in a row 
and the user enters in a seat
custom_steps: When the user clicks submit
custom_expected:
Then The user should receive the following message
Invalid Section
Ballpark Express is not currently offered in your section. Try back soon.

title: Scenario: Accessing the menu when food ordering is disabled for one stand in a list of stands
custom_preconds:
Given The portal is configured to a state such that one section is mapped to multiple stands
and in the portal one of these stands has been turned off for food ordering
and the user has accessed food ordering
and the user has clicked Order Food
and the user enters in a the section number in which maps to multiple stands (one of which has been turned off)
and the user enters in a row
and the user enters in a seat
and the user clicks submit
custom_steps: When the list of stands loads
custom_expected: Then The user should not see that stand in the list of stands to choose from

title: When seat info leads straight to a menu
custom_preconds:
Given A user has accessed food ordering
and food ordering is enabled at the stadium level
and clicked on order food
custom_steps:
When The user Enters in a section which only maps to one stand
and that stand had food ordering enabled
and the user enters in a row
and the user enters in a seat
and the user clicks submit
custom_expected: Then The user will be on that stand's menu

title: When seat info leads to the 'location' screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and food ordering at the stadium level is enabled
custom_steps:
When The user enters in a section that maps to multiple stands
and enters in a valid row
and enters in a valid seat
and clicks submit
custom_expected:
Then The user should see the locations screen
and this will list all the stands that are currently mapped to this section
and these sections will be enabled for food ordering

title: Scenario: Text for Citi Field
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and the users' stadium is Citi Field
and clicked on the Place Order Button
custom_steps: When no further actions are taken
custom_expected: The text beneath the submit button should be 'Only available for Delta seating areas.'

title: Scenario: Verify no text exists for other ballparks
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and the user is not Citi field
and the user is trying this scenario on all ballparks other than Citi field (Citizens Bank Park, Chase Field, Marlins Park, Minute Maid Park, Nationals Park)
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the order food button
custom_expected: Then the text 'Only available for Delta seating area' should not be displayed

title: All Sections available
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
and the user has clicked on Order Food
and the admin portal has at least one stand for each type (Featured, Available, Nearest) for the stadium that is set to true for a particular section

EX. ARI section 132
custom_steps:
When The user enters in a section that has corresponds to at lest one stand of each type (Featured, Available, Nearest) in the admin portal 
and there is at least one stand set to true for each type
and the user enters in a valid row
and seat
and the user clicks to submit
custom_expected:
Then The Locations screen should open
and show the header for each section
and beneath each header should be the list of stands that correspond to both the header and the stand where the stands that are displayed are all set to true 
and no stands that are set to false should be displayed

title: Some sections not available
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
and the admin portal has a section configured where the following conditions are configured:
a) Featured only (more than one stand)
b) Nearest only (more than one stand)
c) Available only (more than one stand)
d) Featured and Nearest
e) Featured and Available
f) Nearest and Available
g) Nearest and Featured and Available
custom_steps:
When a section is entered that is matched to each condition (A-F)
and a seat is entered
and a row is entered
and the user clicks submit
custom_expected:
Then The Locations screen should display with
a) the only header is 'Featured' with the list of corresponding stands listed below 
b) the only header is 'Nearest' with the list of corresponding stands listed below
c) the only header is 'Available' with the list of corresponding stands listed below
d) there are only two headers, 'Featured' and 'Nearest' each with their respective stands listed below each header
e) there are only two headers, 'Featured' and 'Available' each with their respective stands listed below each header
f) there are only two headers, 'Nearest' and 'Available' each with their respective stands listed below each header
g) there are three headers 'Featured' 'Nearest' and 'Available' each with their respective stands listed below each header.

title: Scenario: Menu
custom_preconds: Given The User has accessed every menu for a given ballpark
custom_steps: When no further actions are taken
custom_expected: Then Verify that the menu is correct corresponding to the Menu Item tab in the portal for the corresponding section

title: Scenario: Clicking the back button from selecting a stand
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu screen
and they have selected a stand from the Location Screen
custom_steps: When the user clicks the back button
custom_expected: Then The user will be taken to the Location Screen

title: Scenario: Clicking the back button from being pushed to a stand
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and the user has not seen the locations screen
custom_steps: When The user clicks the back button
custom_expected: Then the user is brought to the 'Enter Seat Info' Screen

title: Scenario: Categorization of menu
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the menu
custom_steps: When The page loads
custom_expected:
Then The items are broken down into categories (beverage, food, merchandise) - all are subject to availability.
and items from one category should not be listed in another category (EX. food should not be in beverages) as according to the Menu Item tab in the food ordering portal.

title: Scenario: Item does have an item detail screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the Menu Item tab in the portal for a given stadium
and stand
custom_steps:
When the user checks to see that that item has a description 
or an image url
and the user clicks on the item in the front end application
custom_expected: Then the Item Detail Screen will open

title: Scenario: Arrow present on menu items
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed a menu
and there is at least one item on the menu in which has an item detail screen
custom_steps: When the user scrolls to that item
custom_expected: Then the user will see an arrow on that item (to the far right of the cell)

title: Scenario: Item does not have an item detail screen
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the Menu Item tab in the portal for a given stadium
and stand
custom_steps:
When the user checks to see if that item neither has a description
nor an image url
custom_expected: Then that item will not have an item detail screen

title: Scenario: Arrow not present on menu items
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed a menu
and there is at least one item on the menu in which does not have an item detail screen
custom_steps: When the user scrolls to that item
custom_expected: Then there should not be an arrow on that item's cell in the far right

title: Scenario: Accessing the item detail screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and the item has an item detail screen
custom_steps: When The user clicks on an item in the menu
custom_expected: Then The 'Item Detail' Screen will open for that Menu item.

title: Scenario: Adding an unmodified item to the cart
custom_preconds: Given The user has accessed the menu
custom_steps: When The user has clicked on the plus sign for an unmodified item that has not been yet added to the cart
custom_expected:
Then The user will see that item added in a separate line beneath the name of the item
and this item will have a minus sign next to the item

title: Scenario: Adding an additional same unmodified item to the cart
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and the user has added an unmodified item to the cart
custom_steps: When The user clicks the plus sign for the same item that was already added to the cart
custom_expected:
Then there will be a second item added beneath the umbrella item stating the item that was added
and this item will also have an x (Android) to the left of the item 
and this item will also have an - (iOS) to the left of the item

title: Scenario: Adding the first modified item to the cart
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the menu
and this menu has modified items available
custom_steps:
When the user clicks on the plus sign for an item that has modifiers
and the modifier modal opens
and the user selects modifiers
and clicks add
custom_expected:
Then the modifier modal will close
and beneath the umbrella item there will be an entry for the modified item
and the name of the item will be there
and there will be a comma separated listing of all modifiers for that item

title: Scenario: Adding an additonal identical modified item to the cart
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the menu
and this menu has modified items available (Ex. PHI section 134) 
and the user has added a modified item to the cart
custom_steps: When the user adds an exact replica of the modified item that was added to the cart
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an additional entry located beneath the umbrella item. 
and this item will list the item name
along with all modifiers the user has selected for that item

title: Scenario: Adding a differently modified item to the cart of the same umbrella item
custom_preconds:
Given the user has accessed the menu
and the menu contains multiple items that have modifiers (ex. Lettuce, tomato, cheese)
and the user has added a modified item to the cart
custom_steps:
When the user adds another modified item to the cart
and this item is the same umbrella item as the one that was already added to the cart
but, this item is modified differently
custom_expected:
Then The user will see another entry beneath the umbrella item
and this entry will be distinct to the modifiers that the user added

title: Scenario: Android- Deleting an unmodified item
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an Android device
and the user has added an unmodified item to the cart
custom_steps: when the user clicks on the x to the left of the unmodified added to the cart
custom_expected:
Then that item is removed from from beneath the umbrella item
and the price of that one item is subtracted from the subtotal at the bottom of the screen.

title: Scenario: IOS- Deleting an unmodified item
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an IOS device
and the user has added an unmodified item to the cart
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the minus sign next to the item they wish to delete
custom_expected:
Then that item will be removed 
and the umbrella item will still remain in the menu
and the cost of that item will be subtracted from the subtotal at the bottom of the screen

title: Scenario: Android-Deleting a modified item
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an Android device
and the user has added a modified item to their cart
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the 'x' sign next to the item they wish to delete
custom_expected:
Then The item will be deleted from the users cart
and the umbrella item will still remain
and the total cost of that modified item (including paid modifiers) will be subtracted from the subtotal at the bottom of the screen.

title: Scenario: IOS- Deleting a modified item
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an IOS device
and the user has added a modified item to the cart
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the minus sign next to the modified item they wish to delete
custom_expected:
Then that item will be removed from the cart
and the cost of that item (including any paid modifiers) will be subtracted from the subtotal at the bottom of the screen.

title: Scenario: Adding an item that is the last item in the menu on this page
custom_preconds: Given the user has accessed the menu
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the add button on a menu item
and this menu item is the last item in the current view
and is not the last item in the menu
custom_expected: Then The page will scroll up to show the addition of this item to the cart

title: Scenario: Back Button on Item Detail Screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and clicked on an item's arrow to open that item's item detail screen
custom_steps: When The back button is clicked on
custom_expected: Then The user will be returned to the Menu Screen

title: Scenario: Image on Item Detail Page
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and clicked on an item
and there is an image in the food ordering portal corresponding to that item for that ballpark
and stand

Good Test: Philly in QA - Citizens Bank Park Stand  - MLB Burger
custom_steps: When The item detail pages loads
custom_expected: Then The image should be displayed

title: Scenario: No Image on Item Detail Page
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and the user has clicked on an item
and this item does not have an image associated in the portal for this ballpark 
and stand
and item
custom_steps: When the page loads
custom_expected: Then The user will not see an image on this screen

title: Scenario: Seeing the name of the item on the item detail screen.
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and opened an item detail screen for an item
custom_steps: When The page loads
custom_expected: Then The item detail screen should have the name of the item as configured in the Menu Item section in the food ordering portal for the stand & ballpark

title: Scenario: Viewing price for item on item detail screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and clicked on an item
custom_steps: When The page loads
custom_expected:
Then The user should see the price for (1) of that item 
and the currency will be in the currency of the ballpark's country.

title: Scenario: Description of Item on Item Detail Screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and has clicked on an item to open the item detail screen
custom_steps: When No further actions are taken
custom_expected: Then The user should see the description that is set in the Menu Item section in the food ordering portal for the stand & ballpark

title: Scenario: Checkout button when no items in cart on Menu screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and the user has not added any items to the cart.
custom_steps: When no other actions are performed.
custom_expected:
Then The checkout button at the bottom right corner of the screen will be grayed out
and the button will be disabled
And the app will not react when it is tapped

title: Scenario: Checkout Button Items in cart Menu Screen
custom_preconds: Given The user has accessed the menu screen
custom_steps: When the user adds at least 1 item to their cart
custom_expected:
Then The check-out button at the bottom right corner of the screen will be enabled
and the button will be green.

title: Scenario: Checkout button when only $0 items in the cart
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed food ordering
and has accessed a stadium and stand that has $0 items (ex. WSH section 101)
and the user has the allow zero rated items set to Yes in the portal's Stand tab for a level 2 user.
custom_steps:
When The user adds a $0 item to their cart
and no other items are added
custom_expected:
Then The checkout button will be enabled
and green
and clicking it takes the user to the Review screen

title: Scenario: Clicking checkout opens Review screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the menu
and added an item to the cart
custom_steps: When The user clicks on the checkout button
custom_expected: Then the Review screen will open

title: Scenario: Back Button on Review Screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has added an item to the cart
and the user has clicked the check out button
custom_steps:
When The page loads
and the user clicks the back button
custom_expected:
Then The user will be brought to the menu screen
and all items that were added to their cart will still be there
and the user will have the ability to add more items if desired
and delete items if desired

title: Scenario: Pick-up text on order review screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has added a modified item 
and/or an unmodified item to the cart
and the user has clicked check-out
and the stand is a pick-up stand
custom_steps:
When The page loads
and the page that loads is the Review Screen
custom_expected: Then The text should read  "Pick-up From: <Location>" at the top of the screen

title: Scenario: Text for delivery stadiums on order review screen
custom_preconds:
Given The user has added a modified
and/or an unmodified item to the cart
and the user is placing this order with a delivery stand  (ex. WSH section 101) 
and the user clicks checkout
custom_steps:
When The page loads
and that page is the review screen
custom_expected: Then The text should read "Deliver To: Section <section> Row <row> Seat <seat>"

title: Scenario: Review Screen prices for items
custom_preconds:
Given The user has added one unmodified menu to the cart
and the user has added two identical modified menus with paid modifiers to the cart
and the user has added two identical modified menus with free modifiers to the cart
and the user has clicked checkout
custom_steps: When the Review Screen loads
custom_expected:
Then Each unique ordered should be listed with the quantity ordered
and the price should be for the total of that many of that item.
EXAMPLE: Ordering 5 of item x  - the price on that line should be 5(price item x) 
not the price of x. 
and the all modifiers should be listed beneath the umbrella item
and the paid modifiers should have the same price notation as the item itself

title: Scenario: Review Screen - listing of modified items
custom_preconds:
Given The user has added two identically modified items to the cart
and the user has added two differently modified items to the cart (same umbrella item, different modifiers)
and the user has clicked checkout
custom_steps: When the review screen loads
custom_expected:
Then Each differently modified item should have its own entry. 
and items that are modified the same will appear in the same entry
and there will be a number left of the item indicating how many of that item are in the cart.

title: Scenario: Modifiers listed below the item on Review screen
custom_preconds: Given The user has added two separate modified items to the cart
custom_steps: When The user clicks checkout
custom_expected:
Then The Review Screen will load
and each item will be listed in bold
and all modifiers will be listed beneath the item
and all modifiers will be indented
and the modifiers will not be in a bold typeface.
and multiple modifiers can be listed on one line
and if there is a cost associated with a modifier on the line then the cost will show up on the right in vertical alignment with other prices

title: Scenario: Subtotal
custom_preconds:
Given The user has added an unmodified 
and/or modified item to the cart
and the user has clicked checkout
custom_steps: When The Review Screen loads
custom_expected:
Then The subtotal is the sum of only the items ordered.
and does not add any tax
or fees

title: Scenario: Convenience Fee
custom_preconds:
Given The user is placing an order from the following stands
a) fixed convenience fee  (ex. PHI 134) 
b) percentage based convenience fee (CURRENTLY NOT WORKING) 
c) no convenience fee  (ex. WSH 101)
and the user added an unmodified item to their cart
and the user clicked the checkout button
custom_steps: When The page loads
custom_expected:
Then The convenience fee should be
a) the rate that is listed in the portal
and when the user backs out of the review screen

title: Scenario: Credit Card Number showing on Order Screen
custom_preconds: Given The user has placed an order
custom_steps:
When The user navigates to the My Orders Screen
and clicks on the order
custom_expected: Then The card number should show the last 4 digits.

title: Scenario: Matching between My Orders and Order
custom_preconds: Given The user has placed an order on the device
custom_steps:
When The user navigates to my orders
and clicks on an order to open the Summary Screen
custom_expected:
Then The <Status> on My orders should match the Status field in the Summary Screen
and <check number> in My Orders should match the Chk Number field in the Summary Screen
and <price> in My Orders should match the Total in the Summary Screen
and the date on My Orders should match the Date Field in the Summary Screen for the date only

title: Scenario: Error from credit card processing
custom_preconds:
Given The user has placed an order on this device within the past 720 hours
and the user has accessed my orders
and the user has placed an order at a stadium in which the credit card has had an error
custom_steps: When The user opens the order that had a credit card error
custom_expected: Then below the Status Error the user will see the following text 'There was an error processing your credit card. Please try again.'

title: Scenario: Scrolling
custom_preconds:
Give Special Attention to the latest Android OS for this test. 

Given The user has placed an order
and this order should be a large order with several items to take up more than 1 page.  (PHI section 134 is a good stand) 
and the user has clicked on My Orders
custom_steps:
When the user clicks on an order from My Orders
and the user scrolls the page
custom_expected:
Then the user should be able to scroll the page without any problems
all horizontal rule on the page should not remain in a fixed position on the page

title: Scenario: Interruption within UI
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using
a) an IOS device
b) an Android device
and the user is within the UI of Food ordering
custom_steps:
When The user
a) receives a phone call
b) receives a text message
c) has an alarm go off
custom_expected: Then The user should remain within the same page within the UI

title: Scenario: Interuption while a call is being made
custom_preconds:
Given The user is using an
a) IOS device
b) Android device
custom_steps:
When a call is being made such that
a) a seat is being submitted
b) an order is being submitted

and the user receives an interruption such that 
a) a phone call is received
b) a text is received
c) an alarm goes off
custom_expected: Then if the call times out via an error, the user should be able to submit again

title: Scenario: Button depressed state
custom_preconds: Given The user has accessed Food Ordering
custom_steps: When A button is depressed in the app
custom_expected: Then The button should appear as if it is depressed.

title: Scenario: IOS Fields on Edit Card Screen (no abbreviated wallet case)
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an IOS device
and the user will be editing a card that will not follow the abbreviated wallet flow
a) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM HOME SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH NO WALLET
b) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM HOME SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH A WALLET
c) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM WALLET SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH NO WALLET
d) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM WALLET SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH A WALLET
e) USER WHO REGISTERED FROM HOME SCREEN
f) USER WHO REGISTERED FROM WALLET SCREEN
and the user has clicked complete order
custom_steps: When The user clicks to edit a card to their wallet by clicking on the blue arrow next to the card
custom_expected:
The The fields should be:
Below Card Information:
Description (text input field)
Card Type (scroll) 
Card Number (text input field)
Expiration Date (two scrolls)
Name on Card (text input field)
Phone Number (text input field)
Phone Type (scroll)
and Below Billing Address
First Name (text input field)
Last Name (text input field)
Address 1 (text input field)
Address 2 (optional) (text input field)
City (text input field)
State/Province (scroll)
Zip Code (text input field)
Country (Scroll)

title: Scenario: Android  Edit Card Pages (no abbreviated wallet)
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an Android device
a) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM HOME SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH NO WALLET
b) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM HOME SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH A WALLET
d) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM WALLET SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH A WALLET
and the user has clicked complete order
custom_steps: When the user clicks to edit a card that does not follow the abbreviated wallet flow
custom_expected:
Then the Edit Card Screen will be in two pages
and the first pages fields will be: Desciption (text input field)
and Card Type (Drop down field)
and Card Number (text input field)
and Exp. Date (two drop down fields - one for MM and one for YYYY)
and Name on Card (text input field)
and Phone # (text input field)
and Phone Type (drop down)
and their will be a continue button on the bottom right corner of the page
and the second page will be sub-titled Billing Address
and have First Name field (text input)
and Last Name (text input)
and Address 1 (text input)
and Address 2 (text input)
and City (text input)
and State/Province (drop down)
and Zip Code (text input)
and Country (drop down)
and their will be a save button at the bottom right corner

title: Scenario: IOS: Save Button when leaving a field blank
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the Add Card Screen
and the user is using an IOS device
and the user enters in information in some of the required fields
and does not enter information in all fields
custom_steps: When the user clicks save
custom_expected:
Then The user will receive an error 
Please Check Your Information
and the following line will appear for each blank field
.Please enter <field>

custom_preconds:
Given The user has clicked complete order
and the user is signed in to an account that has card(s) that is/are not following the abbreviated wallet flow

custom_steps:
When When the user enters in all fields correctly on this screen
and clicks on the Continue button
custom_expected: Then The user will be brought to the next page in the add card flow.

title: Scenario: Android Continue button missing information on Edit Card screen for not abbreviated wallet flow
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using an Android device
a) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM HOME SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH NO WALLET
b) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM HOME SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH A WALLET
c) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM WALLET SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH NO WALLET
d) USER WHO SIGNED IN FROM WALLET SCREEN WITH BAMNET ACCOUNT WITH A WALLET
e) USER WHO REGISTERED FROM HOME SCREEN
f) USER WHO REGISTERED FROM WALLET SCREEN
and the user has clicked complete order
custom_steps:
When The user clicks the the pencil to the right of a card to edit the card
and this card does not follow the abbreviated card flow

custom_expected:

Please Check Your Information

title: Scenario: Android: Save Button on missing fields for not abbreviated wallet flow on Edit Card Screens

and the user clicked continue
and the user was brought to the next page
custom_steps:
When The user leaves some fields blank on this screen
and the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
Then the user will receive the message
Please Check Your Information
and the following line will repeat for each blank field
.Please enter <Field Name>

title: Scenario: Android: Save Button - submission for Editing a card that does not have the abbreviated wallet flow
custom_preconds:
Given The user is using an Android Device
and the user is signed into an account that has a bamnet wallet associated with it 
and this wallet has cards that do not follow the abbreviated wallet flow
and the user has clicked complete order
and the user has clicked on the pencil next to a card to edit a card 
and this card does not follow the abbreviated wallet flow 
and on the first page the user entered all fields
and the user clicked continue
and the user was brought to the next page
and the user enters in valid information in all fields
custom_steps: When The user clicks Save
custom_expected:
Then The user will be brought to the wallet screen
and their credit card will be added to beneath the 'Please select a card' text
and if there were other cards that already existed in the wallet, this would would be added alphabetically as per description
and the information that is visible on this card is description
and last four digits
and expiration date 
and if the user were to log out
and log back in, then that card would still be there

title: Scenario: IOS : Save Button - submission
custom_preconds:
Given The user is using an IOS Device
and the user has accessed the add a card screen
and the user has entered all fields
custom_steps: When the user clicks the save button
custom_expected:
Then The user will be brought to the wallet screen
and their credit card will be added to beneath the 'Please select a card' text
and if there were other cards that already existed in the wallet, this would would be added alphabetically as per description
and the information that is visible on this card is description
and last four digits
and expiration date
and if the user were to log out
and log back in, then that card would still be there

title: Scenario: Functionality of adding a card
custom_preconds:
Given The user has signed in 
and has clicked complete order
and accessed their wallet
custom_steps:
When The user clicks to add a card to their wallet
and they add a card to their wallet
custom_expected:
Then that card will be added to their wallet 
and it will be able to be selected in their personal wallet

title: Scenario: Verify the card is also added on the desktop site
custom_preconds: Given The user has added a card to their wallet
custom_steps: When The user checks their account on qa.mlb.com/index.jsp on a desktop computer
custom_expected: Then The card they added should be listed in their list of credit cards.

title: Scenario: Clicking ok on Please Check your information
custom_preconds:
Given The user has accessed the Add card screen
and the user has received the error message Please Check Your Information by attempting to submit with blank fields
custom_steps: When the user clicks ok on the error message
custom_expected:
Then The user should be on the Add Card screen
and any information that was previously entered should still persist
and the user should be able to edit the input fields

title: Scenario: Android - Add Card - Save Button
custom_preconds:
Given The user is using an Android device
and the user has logged in
and the user has clicked complete order
custom_steps:
When the user enters in the description field validly 
and the user has selected a valid card type
and the user has entered in a valid card number
and the user has entered a valid expiration date
and the user has entered a valid name for the card
and the user clicks the save icon at the top right of the screen
custom_expected:
Then The user will be taken back to their wallet
and the card that was just added will be in this list
